actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To provide for phased-in payment of Social Security Disability Insurance payments during the waiting period for individuals with a terminal illness.
short_title: Social Security Disability Fairness Act of 2016

summary.text:
Social Security Disability Fairness Act of 2016 

 This bill amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to prescribe formulae for payment of Social Security Disability Insurance benefits over a period of 24 consecutive calendar months for individuals determined to be under a disability upon submission of a diagnosis of a terminal illness.

titles.title: Social Security Disability Fairness Act of 2016
To provide for phased-in payment of Social Security Disability Insurance payments during the waiting period for individuals with a terminal illness.
